name: Girlfriend_From_Hell
display_help: Conjure demons from the depths of the netherworld and beyond. These demonic servitors wield hellfire and serve you through some dark compact. You are capable of summoning a variety of different infernal minions each with its own strengths and weaknesses.
power_short_helps: Ranged, Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Minor DoT (Toxic), -Res
Close, High DMG(Fire), Foe -Res, Knockdown, Minor DoT(Toxic)
Short Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Fire), Foe -Res, Knockdown, DoT(Toxic)
